checkInDate.description: Hotel rooms prices will be calculated for this check-in date. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD. For example, '2023-09-03'.

checkOutDate.description: Hotel rooms prices will be calculated for this check-out date. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD. For example, '2023-09-09'.

currency.description: Select the desired currency. For example, 'USD'.

includeAttractions.description: If checked, the results will include attractions/things to do for a given location.

includeHotels.description: If checked, the results will include hotels for a given location.

includePriceOffers.description: Check this field if you want to extract price offers for hotel listings.

includeRestaurants.description: If checked, the results will include restaurants for a given location.

includeVacationRentals.description: If checked, the results will include vacation rentals for a given location.

language.description: Select the desired language. For example, 'en'.

locationFullName.description: This is the location name as you would enter it in a Tripadvisor search. The scraper takes the first result as the desired location. Insert countries, cities, or neighborhoods. For example, 'New York'.

startUrls.description: Array of URLs to start with...

maxItems.description: Limit the number of places to be scraped. Leave this field blank or use '0' to get unlimited number of places.

useApifyProxy.description: Set to true to use Proxy.
